attributes.action: advacate manchester united leaving the premier league and create a european super league
attributes.additional_details:
Manchester United should leave the English premier league and create a European super league.United actually attract 51% of the world wide TV audience, with all the rest added together attracting only 49%..
Without us the premier league would get less TV money than Scotland.
Yet the league who parasite off the back of Manchester United clearly have an agenda of Bias against us, along with referees and the English media who perpetuated a myth of the complete opposite..
Enough is Enough lets leave and watch  english football rot in it's own mediocrity..I sick of nomark clubs been aided and abetted by referees with what is becoming obscene bias!
